ygData.subject: Re: Elkantar list of things to remember as a Wizard v1.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Redefine one of your socials as /loc and drag it as a hot button.  This will make it quicker when you are about to die and will help you navigate a lot better.
ygData.messageBody:
Redefine one of your socials as /loc and drag it as a hot button. This will
make it quicker when you are about to die and will help you navigate a lot
better.

AND while you're at that, bind /corpse to another hot button. If you find
your corpse, you can drag it to safety by running and quickly hitting the
corpse button. (Now that I have told you this they will probably program
that out of the game...)

Mazurik

1. Whenever you are engaged in battle, wether you think you can win
or not, always type /loc before or during battle. That way when
or if you die you can scroll up in the chat window and get a
general idea asto where your corpse is.
